Recommendations and pre-requisites for the use of uterine balloon tamponade 
Uterine Balloon Tamponade (UBT). 
There is currently uncertainty about efficacy of uterine balloon tamponade, with some trials suggesting it can 
delay effective treatment.  
Until more evidence is available, the Recommendations specified by WHO (2021) should be adhered to.
